title: Tata Group seeks RBI waiver to avoid listing NBFC: Report
description: Tata Group has requested a waiver from the Reserve Bank of India to avoid listing its holding company and non-banking finance firm, Tata Sons, due to revised RBI regulations in October 2021. The conglomerate needs to list by September 2025 to comply with the regulation. Tata Sons is a systemically important investment company that heavily borrows from the banking system.
